scripts.build:prod: npm run images && hugo && npm run optimize:html
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npm run s3_sync_html && npm run s3_sync_images && npm run s3_sync_webp && npm run s3_sync_sitemap
scripts.s3_sync_html: aws --region us-west-2 --profile farfromhome s3 sync --delete --exclude '*' --include '*.html' --include '*.xml' --cache-control 'max-age=43200' --storage-class REDUCED_REDUNDANCY public/ s3://farfromhome.asia/
scripts.s3_sync_images: aws --region us-west-2 --profile farfromhome s3 sync --delete  --exclude '*.webp' --exclude '*.html' --exclude '*.xml' --exclude '.gitkeep' --cache-control 'max-age=31536000' --storage-class REDUCED_REDUNDANCY public/ s3://farfromhome.asia/
scripts.s3_sync_webp: aws --region us-west-2 --profile farfromhome s3 sync --delete  --exclude '*' --include '*.webp' --content-type 'image/webp' --cache-control 'max-age=31536000' --storage-class REDUCED_REDUNDANCY public/ s3://farfromhome.asia/
scripts.s3_sync_sitemap: aws s3 cp --profile farfromhome --storage-class REDUCED_REDUNDANCY --cache-control 'max-age=300' public/sitemap.xml s3://farfromhome.asia/sitemap.xml
